body_html:
@ebrevdo Maybe I don't understand something but is it possible to execute forward pass of dynamic_rnn on one GPU and backward pass on an another GPU. Should it be two times faster in this case?

@ASDen It looks like you made opposite conclusions. Can you clarify what is faster MultiRNNCell or manually constructed cells?

@ebrevdo Maybe I don't understand something but is it possible to execute forward pass of dynamic_rnn on one GPU and backward pass on an another GPU. Should it be two times faster in this case?

@ASDen It looks like you made opposite conclusions. Can you clarify what is faster MultiRNNCell or manually constructed cells?
